review: Unfortunately I have not been able to use this device because my computer does not have a compatible system to support it. Others in the household have not tried it on their devices so I have no idea if it works or not. The ad that encouraged me to buy it did not mention this issue but the box does, in small print. I even went to a retail store and asked and the sales person was not aware of any requirements until reading the box.
